text:
The Cookie Manger is not attaching the cookies that I set up to the request.  
This is needed for satisfying sites that require a cookie for validation.

I have setup a CookieManager and have entered a cookie and its value.  It is 
not being attached to the request when it is sent out.
creator: tgreening@yahoo.com

text:
I suspect user error.  I tested this, and it works fine, but if you don't put
valid values into the cookie, it won't get sent.  For instance, the domain needs
to match, the path needs to match, the cookie cannot be expired, etc.
creator: mstover1@apache.org
